.. _`SnpSift Genes Sets`:

SNPSIFT GENES SETS
==================

Annotate using GMT genes sets.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_snpsift_gmt:
        input:
            vcf = "in.vcf",
            gmt = "fake_set.gmt"
        output:
            vcf = "annotated/out.vcf"
        log:
            "annotate.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/snpsift/geneSets"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris
